trans-unit.source: Files you've previously accessed will show up here
trans-unit.target: 您最近開啟過的檔案和資料夾將顯示在此處

trans-unit.source: Send the developers an issue report with detailed information
trans-unit.target: 向開發者回報詳細的問題資訊

trans-unit.source: Open a specific page or pages

trans-unit.target: 歡迎使用通用檔案管理器！

trans-unit.source: To get started, you'll need to grant us permission to display your files. This will open a Settings page where you can grant us this permission. You'll need to reopen the app once you've completed this step.
trans-unit.target: 請授權我們使用您的檔案系统。Windows 設定畫面將會開啟，接著您可以授權。您需要在完成設定後重新啟動應用程式。

trans-unit.source: is a subfolder of the source folder
trans-unit.target: 是源資料夾的子資料夾
注意：這些是實驗性的功能！

trans-unit.source: An item with this name already exists in this directory.
trans-unit.target: 目標目錄已存在同名檔案。

trans-unit.source: We weren't able to delete this item
Please insert the necessary drive to access this item.
The file you are attempting to access may have been moved or deleted.
trans-unit.target: 目標檔案可能已被移動或删除。

trans-unit.source: The file you are attempting to preview may have been moved or deleted.
trans-unit.target: 欲預覽的檔案可能已被移動或删除。

trans-unit.source: The folder you are attempting to access may have been moved or deleted.
trans-unit.target: 目標資料夾可能已被移動或删除。
您把此資料夾刪除了嗎？

trans-unit.source: The file you're trying to delete is currently being used by an another application.
trans-unit.target: 欲删除的檔案正被其他程式使用。

trans-unit.source: The requested operation is not supported
The item name must not contain the following characters: \ / : * ? " < > |
trans-unit.target: 檔案名稱不能包含下列任何字元：\ / : * ? " < > |

trans-unit.source: The item name must not contain the following characters: \ / : * ? " < > |
trans-unit.target: 檔案名稱不能包含下列任何字元：\ / : * ? " < > |

trans-unit.source: Show extensions for known file types
trans-unit.target: 顯示已知檔案類型的副檔名
顯示所有檔案和資料夾
顯示所有檔案和資料夾
在檔案內容中顯示檔案擁有者
正在將檔案丟進垃圾桶

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to permanently delete all these items?
trans-unit.target: 您確定要全數永久刪除？
以系統管理員身分執行

trans-unit.source: Enter password to unlock the drive
Please check the password and try again.
trans-unit.target: 請確認密碼並再試一次。
以另一位使用者的身分執行

trans-unit.source: Open folder in a new tab
trans-unit.target: 在新的索引標籤開啟資料夾

trans-unit.source: When opening a folder in Files
Can't access any items to display
trans-unit.target: 無法存取並顯示任何項目

trans-unit.source: The source and destination file names are the same.
trans-unit.target: 來源及目的地的檔名相同。

trans-unit.source: The destination folder is the same as the source folder.
trans-unit.target: 目的地資料夾和來源資料夾相同。

trans-unit.source: Files ran into a problem that the developers didn't prepare for yet.
trans-unit.target: 通用檔案管理器遇到未處理的問題。
看看誰為通用檔案管理器做出貢獻

trans-unit.source: Find out what's new in Files
trans-unit.target: 看看通用檔案管理器的新功能

trans-unit.source: The item referenced is either invalid or inaccessible.{0}Error message:{0}{1}
trans-unit.target: 參考項目無效或無法存取。{0}錯誤訊息：{0}{1}

trans-unit.source: There's nothing to share right now...
trans-unit.target: 目前沒有任何可分享的項目…

trans-unit.source: The items you've selected will be shared
trans-unit.target: 您將分享已選擇的項目

trans-unit.source: The selected item will be shared
trans-unit.target: 已選擇的項目將被分享

trans-unit.source: The item you're attempting to rename no longer exists. Please verify the correct location of the item you need to rename.
trans-unit.target: 您欲重新命名的項目不存在。 請檢查您需要重新命名的檔案路徑。

trans-unit.source: The name specified was invalid. Please check the desired item name and try again.
trans-unit.target: 此檔名無效。請檢查新檔名並再試一次。

trans-unit.source: The length of the item name specified exceeds the maximum limit. Please check the desired name and try again.
trans-unit.target: 新檔名超出最大長度限制。請檢查新檔名並再試一次。

trans-unit.source: The application needs to be restarted in order to apply the language setting, would you like to restart the app?
trans-unit.target: 應用程式需要重啟以更改語言設定。您要重啟嗎？

trans-unit.source: We weren't able to create this item
Are you sure you want to delete these {0} items?
trans-unit.target: 確定要刪除這 {0} 個項目嗎?

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
trans-unit.target: 您確定要刪除此項目嗎？

trans-unit.source: Selects the best multitasking control based on how the app window is resized. When the window is small, you'll notice the horizontal tab strip is collapsed into a flyout on the navigation toolbar.
trans-unit.target: 基於應用程式視窗的大小自動調整最佳的多工設定。 當視窗縮小，您會發現水平的索引標籤條縮小成在導覽列上的快顯視窗。

trans-unit.source: Always hides the vertical multitasking flyout from the navigation toolbar, and shows the traditional horizontal tabstrip on the app window. This is suited for users who need to keep track of every open app instance at all times.
trans-unit.target: 總是從導覽列移除垂直的多工快顯視窗，並在上方顯示傳統的水平頁籤條。這適用於想要時時確認每個開啟的索引標籤的使用者。

trans-unit.source: Collapses the horizontal list of app instances into a vertical flyout on the navigation toolbar, designed for users who want a clean app interface with on-demand access to a multitasking experience.
trans-unit.target: 將所有水平的索引標籤縮成在導覽列上的垂直快顯視窗。此設計針對同時想要一個乾淨的使用者介面以及高效率的多工體驗的使用者

trans-unit.source: Choose a type for this new item below
trans-unit.target: 在下面選擇此新項目的類型

trans-unit.source: Pin Recycle Bin to the sidebar
trans-unit.target: 將資源回收桶釘選至側邊欄

trans-unit.source: Show a confirmation dialog when deleting files or folders
trans-unit.target: 在刪除檔案或資料夾時顯示確認視窗

trans-unit.source: Open items with a single click
Show drives on the home page
Show library cards on the home page
Show recent files on the home page
trans-unit.target: 在首頁顯示最近開啟的項目

trans-unit.source: The device can now be safely removed from the computer.
trans-unit.target: 現在可以安心地從電腦移除此硬體。

trans-unit.source: This device is currently in use. Close any programs, windows or tabs that might be using the device, and then try again.
trans-unit.target: 此裝置使用中。請關閉任何可能使用此裝置的應用程式、視窗或索引標籤，然後再試一次。
將索引標籤移到新視窗

trans-unit.source: There was an issue saving some properties.
trans-unit.target: 儲存某些屬性時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Some properties may contain personal information.
trans-unit.target: 可能有某些屬性包含個人資料。

trans-unit.source: Check the status of file operations here
trans-unit.target: 在此檢查檔案操作的狀態

trans-unit.source: Find out what's new in Files
Send the developers an issue report with more information
trans-unit.target: 傳送包含詳細資訊的問題回報

trans-unit.source: List and sort directories alongside files
trans-unit.target: 將資料夾跟著檔案一起列出及排序

trans-unit.source: Do you want to download and install the latest version of Files?
trans-unit.target: 您要下載並安裝最新版本的通用檔案管理器嗎？
隱藏受保護的作業系統檔案 (建議選項)
隱藏受保護的作業系統檔案 (建議選項)

trans-unit.source: Show unindexed items when searching for files and folders (searches may take longer)
trans-unit.target: 搜尋檔案及資料夾時，顯示未建立索引的部分 (可能會耗費時間)

trans-unit.source: Enable individual preferences for individual directories
trans-unit.target: 為每個個別的資料夾使用個別的檢視模式設定

trans-unit.source: Cache files and folders for better performance
trans-unit.target: 快取檔案及資料夾以獲得更佳的效能

trans-unit.source: Always open new tabs in dual pane mode
trans-unit.target: 永遠在雙面板模式中開啟新索引標籤

trans-unit.source: Move overflow items into a sub menu
trans-unit.target: 將多餘溢出的項目移到子選單

trans-unit.source: Customize the right click context menu
Enable animations when opening and closing the context menu
trans-unit.target: 用動畫顯示開啟及關閉時的右鍵選單
啟動通用檔案管理器時

trans-unit.source: Bundle with the same name already exists!
Drag and drop any file or folder here to quickly access it
trans-unit.target: 將檔案或資料夾拖到這裡以快速存取

trans-unit.source: Show bundles on the home page

trans-unit.target: 從側邊欄取消釘選資料夾
已選取檔案的預覽面板

trans-unit.source: Find tips & tricks and learn more about Files
trans-unit.target: 探索訣竅並深入了解通用檔案管理器
前往通用檔案管理器的說明文件網站

trans-unit.source: Enable multiselect options (currently only available in the tiles and grid view layout modes)
trans-unit.target: 啟用多重選取（目前僅可在磁磚（並排）、縮略圖顯示模式中使用）

trans-unit.source: If you change a file extension, the file might become unusable. Are you sure you want to change it?
trans-unit.target: 假如您變更副檔名，檔案可能變得無法使用。您確定要變更？

trans-unit.source: Preemptive cache parallel limit (smaller numbers should work better for hard drives)
trans-unit.target: 「主動式快取」最多可同時執行的執行續 (較小的數量應該會在硬碟上運作得比較好)

trans-unit.source: Use preemptive cache (preload entries in child directories on navigation)
trans-unit.target: 啟用主動式快取 (在瀏覽資料夾時預先載入子資料夾的內容)

trans-unit.source: Show library section on the sidebar
trans-unit.target: 在側邊欄顯示媒體櫃專區
此項作業需要系統管理員身分

trans-unit.source: Would you like to continue as administrator?
trans-unit.target: 是否要以系統管理員身分繼續？
通用檔案管理器正以系統管理員身分執行中
從開始功能表取消釘選
